Package net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.listeners

Class Summary
CMSynergySessionMonitor Monitors a set of one or more CM Synergy sessions, launching new sessions as needed.
CurrentBuildStatusFTPListener Does the same thing as CurrentBuildStatusListener, but also sends it to an FTP server.
CurrentBuildStatusListener Writes a text snippet in a file (typically in a location where the reporting module can read it), indicating the current build status.
CurrentBuildStatusPageListener Updates replaceable text in a pattern file each time the Project status changes.
LockFileListener  
ProgressChangedEvent Notification object with new progress value.
ProjectStateChangedEvent .
